schemes.summary: Provides monthly financial assistance (pension) to persons with certified disabilities who meet income and residency criteria.

eligibility.disability_type: Any certified disability (as per medical certificate)

benefits: Priority for certain state welfare programs
schemes.application_process: Apply online via the Social Justice & Special Assistance Department portal or submit application at the local Taluka/Block Social Welfare office with required documents.

schemes.summary: State scholarships to support education of students with disabilities at school, college and higher education levels.

eligibility.income_limit: Family income limits vary by scholarship category
eligibility.training_requirement: Enrollment in recognized educational institution required

schemes.application_process: Apply through the state scholarship portal or via the educational institution’s scholarship cell; submit documents online or at the district education office.

schemes.scheme_name: Maharashtra Vocational Training & Skill Development for Persons with Disabilities
schemes.summary: Provides vocational training, skill development courses and placement support to increase employability of persons with disabilities.

eligibility.training_requirement: Applicant must enroll in an approved training program

schemes.application_process: Register at designated skill training centers or apply via the Social Justice Department’s training portal; attend assessment and enroll.

schemes.summary: Financial assistance or subsidies for assistive devices and mobility aids for persons with disabilities to improve independence.

eligibility.disability_type: Persons with mobility, visual, hearing and other disabilities
eligibility.training_requirement: Not required; device fitting/training provided when necessary

benefits: Subsidy for wheelchairs, hearing aids, prostheses, and other assistive devices
Periodic maintenance support or replacement assistance
required_documents: Disability certificate specifying assistive device need
schemes.application_process: Apply at the nearest district rehabilitation center, government hospital or via the Social Justice Department assistance portal; submit prescription and disability certification.

schemes.scheme_name: Maharashtra Employment Quota & Placement Support for Divyangjan
schemes.summary: State-level initiatives to reserve government jobs and provide supported employment services for persons with disabilities.

eligibility.training_requirement: May require vocational training or skill certification for specific roles

benefits: Reservation/quota in government jobs as per state rules
schemes.application_process: Apply to government recruitment notifications indicating disability status; contact state placement cells or district employment offices for supported placement services.
